name: Potion Panic (Avocado Jam)
description: Welcome to Potion Panic. In this game you'll play as a mage's apprentice who took a satchel of infinite potions by mistake. You will have to return the satchel, as it contains an important object of your teacher's. In your quest to do this, you will encounter the guardians of the tower, and, in your fear, will chuck random potions at them to try and get past them and towards the end of the level.
